#This file was generated by a Python script, please don't edit it manually!
offmap_achievements = {
	name = achievements_achievements
	window_name = achievements_offmap_window
	button_name = achievements_icon_offmaps_entry
	currency_name = TXT_GRACE
	#currency_gain = monthly_grace
	currency_reset_on_dynasty_change = no
	holder_title = title_achivements			# minor title used to identify a character as holder of this offmap power
	governor_title = d_heroes_of_kelly
	tier = emperor
	non_aggression_modifier = peace_deal_with_china
	coa_religion = taoist
	government = theocracy_government
	beginning_of_history = 2550.3.30
	sound = china_interaction_interface
	display_trigger = {
		always = yes
	}
	policies = {
		china_open
	}
	statuses = {
		achievements_page_1 achievements_page_2 achievements_page_3 achievements_page_4
	}
	
	#These conditions only effect the appearance of the button, it does not actually disable them from being clickable. The same triggers are used in all tribute/boon decisions respectively
	
	icon_triggers = {
	}
	
	monthly_currency_gain = {
	}
	
	temple_names = {
		{ # Founder names
			Botond
		}
		{ # Successor names
			Botond
		}
	}
	holder_succession = {
		is_female = {					# chances of getting a female holder, as a percentage: if the total is >= 100, the new holder will always be female. If the total is <= 0, the new holder will always be male
			value = 0
		}
		culture = {
			hungarian = {
				value = 100
			}
		}

		graphical_culture = { 
			FROM = {
				value = 100
			}
		}

		religion = {
			mesopotamian = {
				value = 100
			}
		}

		dynasty = {
			FROM = {
				value = 99
			}
			actually_culture = {
				value = 0
				additive_modifier = {
					value = 100
					NOT = { FROM = { character = yes } }
				}
			}
		}
		
		likes = {
			likes_concubines = {
				value = 100
			}
		}
		
		dislikes = {
			likes_eunuchs = {
				value = 100
			}
		}
	}
	
	diplomatic_range = { #Already includes the western governor's "normal" diplo range
		always = yes
	}

			display_trigger = { always = yes }

					has_global_flag = achievement_count_of_montecristo
				}
			}
			display_trigger = {
				offmap_achievements = {
					has_status = achievements_page_3
				}
			}
		}
		offmap_achievements_speedwagon_foundation= {

					has_global_flag = achievement_speedwagon_foundation
